description: Earthy and delicious burger with sautéed mushrooms and swiss cheese.

steps.instruction: Season ground beef with salt and pepper. Form into 4 patties.
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced onions and cook until softened.
Add mushrooms to the pan and cook until browned and tender.
Cook burger patties in a pan or on a grill to desired doneness.
During the last minute of cooking, top each patty with a slice of Swiss cheese.
Assemble burgers: bottom bun, patty with cheese, sautéed mushrooms and onions, top bun.

imagePrompt: A juicy mushroom swiss burger on a wooden table, with a side of fries and a refreshing drink. The burger has a perfectly cooked patty, melted swiss cheese, and sautéed mushrooms. The scene is well-lit and captures the deliciousness of the burger.
